programme.title: Aeon Flux
programme.desc: Sci-fi thriller based on the MTV animated series, starring Charlize Theron. In 2415, the human survivors of a killer virus live in a walled hi-tech paradise called Bregna. Among the residents, rebel agent Aeon Flux is given the chance to avenge the murder of her sister when she's assigned to assassinate Bregna's dictator Chairman Trevor Goodchild Karyn Kusama - Director Charlize Theron - Aeon Flux Marton Csokas - Chairman Trevor Goodchild Jonny Lee Miller - Oren Goodchild Sophie Okonedo - Sithandra Amelia Warner - Una Flux Caroline Chikezie - Freya Frances McDormand - Handler Yangzom Brauen - Inari Pete Postlethwaite - Keeper Paterson Joseph - Giroux Charlize Theron - Aeon Flux Marton Csokas - Chairman Trevor Goodchild Jonny Lee Miller - Oren Goodchild Sophie Okonedo - Sithandra Amelia Warner - Una Flux Caroline Chikezie - Freya Frances McDormand - Handler Yangzom Brauen - Inari Pete Postlethwaite - Keeper Paterson Joseph - Giroux.

programme.title: Accident Man: Hitman's Holiday
programme.desc: Troubleshooter Mike Fallon, aka the Accident Man, must beat the world's top assassins to protect the ungrateful son of a mob boss, and save the life of his only friend. Mike also attempts to rekindle his relationship with his maniacal father figure. programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: Comedy adventure starring Rowan Atkinson, and featuring John Malkovich. programme.title: Ocean's 8
programme.desc: Crime caper starring Sandra Bullock, Cate Blanchett and Anne Hathaway. After being released from prison on parole, con artist Debbie Ocean reunites with her old partner-in-crime, Lou Miller. They immediately set about co-ordinating an audacious new heist: stealing a $150 million necklace from the actress wearing it at New York's Met Gala. programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Will Smith, Charlize Theron and Jason Bateman. The life of superhero John Hancock is on the skids; despite having saved countless lives, he's mostly remembered now for destroying property while flying around drunk. programme.title: The Independent
programme.desc: During the final weeks of the most consequential presidential election campaign in US history, America is poised to elect either its first female president or finally break the country's two-party gridlock with its first viable independent candidate. programme.title: Hum Paanch
programme.desc: (1980) The story of a brave woman who stands up against the ruthlessness of a landlord and decides to teach him a lesson. Starring Shabana Azmi, Sanjeev Kumar and Mithun.

programme.title: Raja Ki Aayegi Baraat
programme.desc: Raja rapes Mala and the court orders him to marry her. His family continues to torture Mala and attempts to kill her, but she manages to win over Raja and his family with her good deeds.

programme.title: Brahmachari
programme.desc: (1968) An orphan, Brahmachari, who lives with twelve other young orphans, promises to help a young woman, Sheetal, to unite her childhood betrothed in return for money.

programme.title: Vidhaata
programme.desc: Shammi Kapoor won the 'Best Supporting Actor' award at the Filmfare Awards 1983.

programme.title: Aarzoo
programme.desc: (1999) Love triangle drama about Pooja (Madhuri Dixit) who loves Vijay (Akshay Kumar) but her father wants her to marry Aman (Saif Ali). Whom will Pooja eventually settle with?

programme.title: Radhe Shyam
programme.desc: (Movie @6) World-renowned palmist Vikramaditya falls head over heels in love with doctor Prerana on a train journey. However, the lovers must rewrite their destiny and even cheat death to be together.

programme.title: WAQT: Race Against Time
programme.desc: Shefali Shah won Best Supporting Actress in Stardust Awards, India 2006.

programme.title: Bad Boy
programme.desc: When a good-for-nothing Raghu falls in love with the studious Ritu, it feels like a recipe for disaster. Especially, as Ritu's family is against their relationship. How will the lovers unite?

programme.title: Kaala Sona
programme.desc: Rakesh's father was killed years ago. His killer died too... or so Rakesh thought. But when he finds out that the killer is alive ahd the file closed he decides to avenge his father's murder himself.

programme.title: Jodi No 1
programme.desc: Partners in crime Jai and Veeru set their next target on a rich businessman, Rai Bahadur. Things turn hilarious when both of them fall for his daughters.

programme.title: Gopi
programme.desc: A man stays with his brother in a village and is falsely accused of theft by the landlord. When his brother throws him out, he goes to the city and vows to return only after making money.

programme.title: Kalicharan
programme.desc: (1976) Story of a police officer who goes undercover to catch a wealthy and reputed person involved in criminal activities. Stars Shatrughan Sinha, Reena Roy and Ajit.

programme.title: Socha Na Tha
programme.desc: (2005) Viren can't imagine having an arranged marriage. His parents want him to meet Aditi. They refuse to get married but stay friends. Will Cupid strike and change their minds?

programme.title: Deewar
programme.desc: (Movie @6) Haunted by the past, Vijay turns to crime, while Ravi, his younger brother, becomes an honest cop. Fate pits them against each other when Ravi is sent to nab Vijay.

programme.title: Thappad
programme.desc: This Movie claimed best film in Asian Films Awards, Awards of the International Indian Film Academy Best Dialogue, Gender Sensitivity Award, Tapsee Pannu got Best Actress award for this movie.

programme.title: Hum Aapke Hain Kaun
programme.desc: The film was praised and won several awards including 'Best Popular Film Providing Wholesome Entertainment' at the National Film Awards, India 1995.

programme.title: Holiday - A Soldier is Never Off Duty
programme.desc: This movie won Most Entertaining Action Film in the Big Star Entertainment Awards. Plus, Lux Awards for Best Film, Director (Shekhar Kapur), Actor (Anil Kapoor) and Actress (Sridevi).

programme.title: Saudagar
programme.desc: Subhash Ghai won the 'Best Director' award and Gurudutt Shirali won the 'Best Editor award at the Filmfare Awards 1992.

programme.title: Sanam
programme.desc: Gaurav is deprived of love from his family. After his elder brother Narendra dies in an accident, Gaurav attempts to fill-in for him and joins the army to make his father proud.

programme.title: Half Girlfriend
programme.desc: Madhav meets a girl named Riya and falls in love. After struggling to convince her to be his girlfriend, she halfheartedly agrees to be his 'Half Girlfriend'.

programme.title: Zero
programme.desc: (Movie @6) Bauua, short stature, falls in love with Aafia, scientist suffering from cerebral palsy, but soon breaks up with her. Later, what he learns of Aafia changes his life forever.

programme.title: Kisi Ka Bhai Kisi Ki Jaan
programme.desc: Bhaijaan, a self-avowed bachelor, decides to give up on violence when he falls in love with Bhagyalakshmi. Will he go back to his old ways when he learns about her family's rivalry with a gangster?

programme.title: Dream Girl
programme.desc: A 1977 romantic film of Sapna (Hema Malini) who traps a rich man Anupam (Dharmendra), in her love, as he believes she's his Dream Girl - a name that stayed with the actress forever!

programme.title: Bharat
programme.desc: Bharat is one of the highest grossing film in 2020 also won many awards for Best actor and Best songs of the year.

programme.title: Bareily Ki Barfi
programme.desc: This movie won many awards for different categories like Best Actress, Best Director, Best Scriptwriting, Best Production Design, Best Supporting Actor.

programme.title: Don
programme.desc: Amitabh Bachchan won the 'Best Actor' award, Kishore Kumar won the 'Best Singer - Male award and Asha Bhosle won the 'Best Singer - Female' award at the Filmfare Awards 1979.

programme.title: Pukar
programme.desc: Anil Kapoor won Best Actor Award for this movie, Rajkumar Santoshi won the awards for his direction.

programme.title: Veere Di Wedding
programme.desc: Kalindi friends, come to meet her after they learn about her wedding with her boyfriend, Rishabh. Sakshi takes her girls to Thailand and they rediscover themselves.

programme.title: Good Newwz
programme.desc: (Saturday Superhits) Best Supporting Actress' was awarded to Kiara Advani by the International Indian Film Academy 2020. 'Best Comic Actor' was awarded to Diljit Dosanjh by the Zee Cine Awards 2020.

programme.title: Betaab
programme.desc: Sunny (Sunny Deol) and Roma (Amrita Singh) are childhood friends who meet and fall in love after several years. But their parents are arch foes and will oppose their marriage.

programme.title: Kaho Naa Pyar Hai
programme.desc: The movie was the highest-grossing Bollywood film of 2000 and won several awards including 'Best Film, Best Actor, Best Debut Actor, Best Director, Best Singer - Male/Female.

programme.title: Grand Masti
programme.desc: This movie claimed Power Club - Box Office Award in Zee Cine Awards.

programme.title: Don 2
programme.desc: Shah Rukh Khan won many awards for this movie. This is one of the highest grossing films of 2011.

programme.title: Kranti
programme.desc: (1981) Kranti is the story of India's freedom struggle against the British. Of two brave men who formed bands of revolutionaries to fight for an Independent India.

programme.title: Bawaal
programme.desc: A small-town man who falls in love with the most beautiful girl in town. He wants to marry her one day because marrying her can raise his social position.

programme.title: Qayamat Se Qayamat Tak
programme.desc: The film won several award including, 'Best Film, Best Director, Best Music, Best Singer - Male, Best Debut Actor - Male, Best Cinematographer' at the Filmfare Awards 1989.

programme.title: Crew
programme.desc: (UK TV Premiere) Hailed as 'delectable' by The Times of India, this Rajesh Krishnan-directed comedy follows three bold flight attendants caught in a gold smuggling ring.

programme.title: Sagar
programme.desc: These films praised with many categorical awards like Best Actor, Best Actress, Best Supporting Role - Male, Best Playback Singer - Male.

programme.title: English Vinglish
programme.desc: Sridevi won several awards for her acting and Gauri Shinde won several awards for her direction at various award functions.

programme.title: Chalta Purza
programme.desc: Amar, a young and an honest man, is desperately in search of work in order to make ends meet for his mother and himself. Eventually, he gets a chance to work with the underworld.

programme.title: Teesmarkhan
programme.desc: Having escaped from abusive households, Tees Maar Khan and Vasudha form a familial bond. Years later, a tragedy involving the mafia leaves Tees Maar Khan vying for revenge.

programme.title: Do Phool
programme.desc: (1974) Drama about Charitra (Vinod Mehra) who plays a prank saying he killed his brother Pavitra (Mehmood) but ends up a fugitive when Pavitra's dead body is actually found.

programme.title: Main Prem Ki Diwani Hoon
programme.desc: (2003) A fun filled family film directed by Sooraj Barjatya and starring Hrithik Roshan, Kareena Kapoor and Abhishek Bachchan. Music by Anu Malik.

programme.title: Aparichit
programme.desc: Story of a man who is a meek lawyer by the day and an undertaker by night, who goes all out against the bad elements of the society with his gruesome murders.

programme.title: Company
programme.desc: (Movie@6) Movie Praised with the many awards like Best Editing, Best Action Film, Best Director, Best Dialogue, Vivek Oberoi won Best Debutant - Male Award for this movie.

programme.title: Genius
programme.desc: An orphan joins Raw, the foreign intelligence agency of India. During a mission, all of his comrades die and he decides to seek revenge to find peace in his life.

programme.title: Jazbaa
programme.desc: (2015) Anuradha, an honest lawyer & single mother, finds herself in a do-or-die situation when her daughter Sanaya is kidnapped. Aishwarya Rai got an award for 'Power-Packed Performance of the Year'.

programme.title: City Lights
programme.desc: Deepak Singh is a farmer in Rajasthan. After a tragedy, he migrates to Mumbai with his wife and child to lead a better life. However, he soon discovers the challenges of life in the big city.

programme.title: Commando 3
programme.desc: The commando, Karanveer Singh Dogra, is approached to chase and catch an Indian criminal gang, who pose a threat to India itself.

programme.title: Teri Bhabhi Hai Pagle
programme.desc: Dev, an assistant director, dreams of independently directing a film and manages to convince Raj, a superstar, to produce his film. However, chaos ensues as the shooting commences.

programme.title: Jugnu
programme.desc: Ashok, an orphan, is a highly intelligent fraudster but with a golden heart. Unaware of his true identity, he lives a thrilling life.

programme.title: Judaa Hoke BHI
programme.desc: A married couple struggling with an unimaginable loss are further torn apart when they are lured under false pretences to Uttarakhand separately.

programme.title: Fukrey Returns
programme.sub-title: Just out of jail, a don is ready to get back at the four friends who conned her. Star cast
programme.desc: Pulkit Samrat, Richa Chadha, Varun Sharma and Ali Fazal.

programme.title: Nanu Ki Jaanu
programme.desc: (2018) (Movie @6) Nanu, a land mafia agent, tries to rescue a woman who met with an accident. The woman, however, dies but her ghost arrives in Nanu's apartment.

programme.title: Ateet
programme.desc: Film is about an army officer who goes missing and is declared dead. What happens when he returns after a decade to reclaim his family?

programme.title: Heer Tey Tedhi Kheer

programme.title: Nick Dougherty's Tee Time Tips
programme.desc: As winter descends, hear from former professional Nick Dougherty as he shares his Tee Time Tips to help you improve your game out on the golf course.

programme.title: How The 2003 Men's ICC CWC Was Won
programme.desc: As it happened, this was the story of the 2003 ICC Men's Cricket World Cup held in South Africa, Zimbabwe and Kenya - a tournament ultimately won by Australia.

programme.title: Nick Dougherty's Tee Time Tips
programme.desc: Sky Sports Golf's expert pundit Nick Dougherty is on hand to provide his tee time tips ahead of The 150th Open, taking place at St Andrews.

programme.title: Nick Dougherty's Tee Time Tips
programme.desc: Sky Sports pundit Nick Dougherty returns for more tips on how to improve your game from The Open.

programme.title: DP World Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the DP World Tour's Amgen Irish Open, held at Royal County Down Golf Club.

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the 2024 Procore Championship, held at Silverado Resort in Napa, California. Sahith Theegala's maiden PGA Tour win came at this event.

programme.title: LIVE: NPC: Manawatu v Southland
programme.desc: In the 2024 Bunnings NPC, Manawatu and Southland compete for points. (18.09).

programme.title: British GB3 Highlights
programme.desc: Donington Park stages action from the latest round of the 2024 GB3 Championship. Revisit all the scintillating racing with the weekend's highlights from the iconic circuit.

programme.title: Singapore F1 GP Highlights 2017
programme.desc: The 2017 Singapore Grand Prix at the Marina Bay Street Circuit. Sebastian Vettel starts on pole after a superb qualifying session, with Max Verstappen second, and Lewis Hamilton fifth.

programme.title: WTA Final: Madrid
programme.desc: In a rematch of the 2023 Madrid Open final, world number one Iga Swiatek and defending champion Aryna Sabalenka meet again to determine this year's women's singles champion. (04.05).

programme.title: US Open W/Final:Pegula v Sabalenka
programme.desc: New York's own Jessica Pegula - competing in her first Grand Slam final - takes on last year's runner-up Aryna Sabalenka, as a first-time winner of the US Open is crowned on Ashe. (07.09).

programme.title: US Open Final: Sinner v Fritz
programme.desc: In the men's singles final, Jannik Sinner stands in the way of Taylor Fritz and history, as the home hope looks to end a 21-year wait for an American man to win a Grand Slam title. (08.09).

programme.title: PGA Tour: The Cut
programme.desc: A look behind the scenes of the PGA Tour. Follow the world's best players as they prepare for the big events in 2024.

programme.title: Mayweather v Corrales 2001
programme.desc: Relive one of the great performances in the career of Floyd Mayweather, as 'Pretty Boy' defended his super featherweight world crown against destructive power puncher Diego Corrales.

programme.title: Foreman v Cooney 1990
programme.desc: Watch the iconic crossroads battle between aging heavyweights George Foreman and Gerry Cooney in a billing known as 'The Preacher and The Puncher'.

programme.title: Jaime Munguia: Camp Life
programme.desc: Ahead of his super-middleweight bout with unbeaten Erik Bazinyan, go inside the training camp of Tijuana star Jaime Munguia - aiming to rebound from his sole defeat to Canelo Alvarez.

programme.title: Hearns v Barkley 1988
programme.desc: Defending champion Thomas Hearns entered the squared circle to go toe-to-toe with Iran Barkley on a night in June 1988 billed Knockout Nite.

programme.title: Ali v Bonavena 1970
programme.desc: The stage was set at Madison Square Garden for Muhammad Ali and Oscar Bonavena to fight for the vacant NABF heavyweight title. Ali entered this contest with an unblemished 30-0 record.

programme.title: PGA Tour Champions Highlights
programme.desc: The PGA Tour Champions season rolls on with the Sanford International, taking place at Minnehaha Country Club. 12-time PGA Tour winner Steve Stricker last won this event.

programme.title: Solheim Cup Day 3 Highlights
programme.desc: On the third and final day of the 2024 Solheim Cup from Robert Trent Jones Golf Club, head-to-head competition begins in Gainesville, Virginia. (15.09).

programme.title: PGA Tour: The Cut
programme.desc: A look behind the scenes of the PGA Tour. Follow the world's best players as they prepare for the big events in 2024.

programme.title: European Challenge Tour Golf
programme.desc: The European Challenge Tour took to Portugal for the Open de Portugal at Royal Óbidos, held at Royal Óbidos Spa and Golf Resort. England's Marco Penge won this event last season.

programme.title: How The 2007 Men's ICC CWC Was Won
programme.desc: As it happened, this was the story of the 2007 ICC Men's Cricket World Cup held in the West Indies - a tournament ultimately won by Australia.

programme.title: BMW PGA Championship 2019 Hlts
programme.desc: The final day of the BMW PGA Championship from the Wentworth Club in Surrey. Jon Rahm and Danny Willett continue to share the lead on 15 under heading into the day.

programme.title: PGA Tour Champions Highlights
programme.desc: The PGA Tour Champions season rolls on with the Sanford International, taking place at Minnehaha Country Club. 12-time PGA Tour winner Steve Stricker last won this event.

programme.title: PGA Tour: The Cut

programme.title: European Challenge Tour Golf
programme.desc: The European Challenge Tour took to Portugal for the Open de Portugal at Royal Óbidos, held at Royal Óbidos Spa and Golf Resort. England's Marco Penge won this event last season.

programme.title: PGA Tour Champions Learning Centre
programme.desc: From instruction tips for your game, to fitness advice and lifestyle lessons, hear from the best on the circuit in PGA Tour Champions Learning Centre.

programme.title: NFL Highlights 23/24
programme.desc: Kirk Cousins and the Atlanta Falcons get underway in front of an optimistic Mercedes-Benz Stadium as the Pittsburgh Steelers provide the competition for week one of the NFL season. (08.09).

programme.title: LIVE: Netball International
programme.desc: The Vitality Roses arrive in Adelaide for the first match in a three-Test series against Australia. Jess Thirlby's England are set for back-to-back series, with New Zealand next. (19.09).

programme.title: NFL Bears @ Texans Hlts
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights as the Houston Texans host the Chicago Bears during week two of the NFL. Stefon Diggs and Joe Mixon return after helping the Texans close out victory on debut. (15.09).

programme.title: NFl Hlts
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights as the Atlanta Falcons go to Philadelphia in the NFL. The Eagles' debuting running back Saquon Barkley lifted his team to victory in Sao Paulo previously. (16.09).

programme.title: LIVE: Ladies European Tour Golf
